text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Excuse me, ...CORONAVIRUS Shake Shack returning $10 million government loan meant for small businesses,With the PPP already out of money, the hipster burger chain says other restaurateurs need its loan more than it does. how many small business's were denied and this was approved
